typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Salary as double,
		Dept_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustData
source(output(
		id as integer,
		Dept_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DeptData
CustData, DeptData join(Dept_ID == DeptData@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
